#Text=I read several quotes from Steven Hassan from the internet that made total sense to me , so I ordered his book .
#Text=It 's a fantastic read .
#Text=I learned quite a lot about mind control and particularly found it interesting and true that a key aspect of mind control is INFORMATION CONTROL .
#Text=If one can control the information that you are allowed to receive , then you can really control their thinking .
#Text=They would n't be equipped with all of the ACTUAL information to be able to analyze and made a sane decision about something .
#Text=In Scientology and especially in the Sea Organization , information is controlled intensively .

#Text=This includes ALL communication via telephone or mail – incoming and outgoing – being screened through security personnel in order to detect any antagonism regarding Scientology from the " outside " , no televisions allowed , no internet access , not being permitted to listen to or read any article that said anything negative about Scientology .
#Text=" News " was obtained by the numerous Scientology events , covering the " unprecedented expansion and world-wide acceptance of Scientology " .

column1: #Text=It was a lie , but it kept those not in-the-know thinking that we were doing well , so we need to keep working our guts out .
#Text=It was astonishing to see when I left that Scientology had a BAD reputation of tearing apart families , of attacking critics , of scamming people out of their money , etc.
#Text=I saw how Tom Cruise ( supposedly the BEST Scientology disseminator in the world ) was losing it on Oprah Winfrey 's couch and with Mat Lauer .
#Text=He was actually a laughing stock in the " real world " .
#Text=But to Scientology , per David Miscavige , Tom Cruise is the most dedicated Scientologist he knows and was responsible for booming Scientology around the world .
#Text=Well , the statistics I saw while in management for two decades did n't have a Tom Cruise " boom " of expansion .
#Text=In fact , we were constantly trying to find what was causing a lack of expansion in the various sectors of Scientology .
#Text=So , information control is a very important aspect of mind control to understand and watch for .
#Text=Another book I found to be very beneficial after leaving Scientology was Man 's Search for Meaning by Viktor Frankl .
#Text=It answered a lot for me .
#Text=You described in chapter 6 , being assigned to a sub-division of the Rehabilitation Project Force , called the " RPF 's RPF " .

column1: #Text=How was this different from the main RPF itself ?
#Text=What typical tasks were you ordered to perform ?
#Text=Were there many other women assigned to this unit ?
#Text=Were women given different roles or treated differently than men while on the RPF or the RPF 's RPF ?

#Text=The Rehabilitation Project Force ( or RPF ) is described by the church as a program offering a second chance to Sea Org members who have become unproductive or have strayed from the church 's codes , involving intensive physical labor at church facilities and auditing and study sessions to address the individual 's personal problems .
#Text=I have a much harsher definition after spending a total of 5 ½ years on this program :
#Text=A controlled slave labor camp to which is assigned anyone arbitrarily deemed a liability for actions ( or thoughts ) considered to be in opposition to the group .
